subtitles:
260693 263562 You are confused, aren't you?
Frightened.
263563 265297 That's all right. I can help you.
265298 266331 Who is this?

266332 268400 I am a doctor.
Now, you must listen to me.

268401 271103 You have lost your memory.
There was an experiment.

271104 273038 Something went wrong.
Your memory was erased.
273039 274072 Do you understand me?

274073 276208 No, I don't understand.
What the hell is going on here?

276209 278777 Just listen. There are people
coming for you even as we speak.

278778 282481 You must not let them find you.
You must leave now.
282482 285246 Hello? Are you there?

344344 346845 Hey, Mr. Murdoch.
The Automat called.
346846 349748 Said you left your wallet there.

349749 353051 I suggest you retrieve it since
you only paid for 3 weeks...
353052 356243 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
357024 358658 I've been here 3 weeks?

358659 361694 It's right there in
black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
361695 363424 Day and date.

364131 367633 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.
367634 369502 I'll take care of it when I get back.

369503 371704 See that you do.
Only thing makes you a guest...

371705 376435 in this joint, pal,
is cash on the barrelhead.

398031 400600 House rules.
3 weeks is 3 weeks.
400601 403651 No days off for good behavior.
425359 428988 Mr. Murdoch, yes, where is he?
429029 432726 He just left not 5 minutes ago.

440040 444238 When marimba rhythms
start to play
444278 446337 Dance with me
446380 449372 Make me sway

449416 453546 Like a lazy ocean
hugs the shore
453587 455782 Hold me close
455823 458587 Sway me more

458625 462891 Like a flower
bending in the breeze
462930 465330 Bend with me
465365 468266 Sway with ease

468302 472466 When we dance
you have a way with me
472506 474701 Stay with me
474741 477175 Sway with me
478078 479398 Hey, sweetie!

480047 482181 He said he was your
husband's doctor.
482182 485052 He wanted to speak with you.

508108 511177 Schreber. Please,
won't you come in?
511178 513728 You must be Emma Murdoch.

514181 519118 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
519119 520848 What is this?

521788 525858 A rather crude experiment...
designed to further my studies.
525859 527059 I don't understand.

527060 532198 You say you're my husband's doctor,
but he never mentioned you to me.
532199 533566 The truth is, Mrs. Murdoch...

533567 536068 John has been coming to
see me for quite some time.

536069 539839 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

539840 543009 stemming from your
marital difficulties.

543010 546246 - John told you what happened?
- Yes.

546247 548582 When was the last time
that you saw him?

550084 553887 He packed a suitcase.
He was very angry at me.

553888 556924 I understand how difficult
this must be for you.

556925 558592 But for John's sake,
I would like you...

558593 561261 to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

561262 565065 It appears that John has suffered
a psychotic break.
565066 567156 Complete memory loss.
567936 570003 He may be delusional.
570004 571904 Even violent.

574676 577878 if he were to contact you,
and I suspect he will...

577879 580781 you must call me immediately.
Do you understand?

580782 585185 It is imperative that I be
the first one to reach him.

585186 589636 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
602537 604438 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
604439 607240 It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?

607241 611109 Mr. -was it
"J"- something-Murdoch?
615283 618775 What's your name? Justin? Jerry?

622490 624625 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.
624626 626093 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
626094 627824 Hi. Jack Murdoch.

674509 677711 I told the guy,
"Cash on the barrelhead. "
677712 681214 I said, "Listen, 3 weeks is 3 weeks. "
681215 682482 Where's our lucky winner?
682483 685316 Upstairs, sir, room 614.
685353 688117 Another call girl.
691859 693627 Evening, Husselbeck.
693628 694995 Inspector Bumstead.
694996 697046 Your lace is untied.
710144 711678 Am I glad you're here, sir.

711679 714347 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

714348 718438 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

723891 730261 Wow. Looks like somebody
woke up on the wrong side of the bed.

770873 773423 - Hello.
- Oh, it's you.
773442 774876 You left your wallet here, buddy.
774877 776210 When did I do that?
776211 777378 When you was last here.

777379 780548 - When was that?
- When you left your wallet.
780549 783189 You expect me to remember?
785120 788351 Hello. Excuse me.
789291 791259 No, no, seriously.

809745 811913 - Where you headed, chief?
- Home.
811914 812980 And where's home?

812981 815783 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?

815784 818085 Well, I'm just trying
to do my job, May.

818086 820188 There's a killer out there
in case you hadn't noticed.

820189 826260 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels, huh?
826261 828681 Go on, get out of here.
838440 840990 Round and round she goes.
843111 847207 Where she stops? Nobody knows.

850385 853554 What's that make so far, Husselbeck?
6 hookers in all?
853555 855056 I believe so, sir.
855057 857625 Give the man an "A" for effort.

857626 859894 You'd think these stiffs
would have the good grace...
859895 863030 to expire at a good time of night.
863031 866351 Hey, too bad about Walenski, huh?
868670 871270 I guess he'd seen enough.
877312 878992 So, Husselbeck...

879748 886119 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?
886154 887188 You've got me, sir.
887189 889357 Bumstead, what took you?

889358 892660 This killer's been running circles
around us thanks to Walenski.

892661 894462 With all due respect,
Chief Inspector...

894463 897498 I've known Eddie a long time.
He's a good cop.

897499 901736 Whatever kind of cop Walenski once was,
he let drift a long time ago.
901737 903604 Let me talk to Bumstead!
903605 905006 Come on, let's go.
906408 908706 Frank, Frank!
910178 911345 Get his arm!
911346 912380 They're watching us!
912381 913447 On your feet.
913448 914916 There's no way out!
914917 916284 Don't make us hurt you.
916285 918385 God, can't you see?!
921391 922758 Let me go, let me go!
922759 925294 I'm not gonna hurt you. I'm not-

925295 928155 - What was that?
- Walenski.
935905 939107 I'm being punished for my sins, right?
939108 941510 What did I ever do to inherit this?
941511 942644 Where do you begin?

942645 947683 Well, everything Detective Walenski
committed to paper should be here, so-

947684 952788 The only thing that should
be committed is Walenski.
952789 956649 Nothing like a little healthy paranoia.

958661 963161 Sir, we just got
the fingerprint results in.
965168 968448 What is this, some kind of joke?
971174 973814 Don't throw anything away.
978681 980541 Inspector Bumstead.

982051 985554 I came here to file
a missing persons report for my husband.
985555 987489 Take it to the front desk.
987490 990500 They told me to come see you.
991094 993554 His name's John Murdoch.

994330 997399 Mrs. Murdoch,
why didn't you report this before?

997400 1002637 I mean, if your husband has been missing
as long as you say...

1002638 1006508 I thought he'd simply
walked out on me.

1006509 1010512 Then a... doctor contacted me
this evening.
1010513 1012180 How long have you been married?
1012181 1014001 Nearly four years.
1014584 1016449 Why do you ask?

1016486 1019621 Because you seem uncomfortable
with your ring.

1019622 1023325 As if you were...
unaccustomed to wearing it.
1023326 1025836 No, I never take it off.

1031334 1035361 Do these names
mean anything to you?
1040710 1043170 No. Who are these women?

1043513 1045914 Why are you looking
for my husband?

1045915 1047816 Are you going to accuse him
of something?
1047817 1050115 Maybe. Maybe murder.
1050153 1051473 Whose murder?

1052588 1056285 - Which one?
- All of them.

1057260 1059494 Mrs. Murdoch,
I am sorry, I'm sorry.
1059495 1060595 I didn't mean to alarm you.

1060596 1063198 I'm so sorry that I came.
Just both made a mistake.
1063199 1064699 Mrs. Murdoch, if you please.

1064700 1069710 If you'll just give me
half a second to explain-
1070473 1072393 I'll be right out.
1095631 1097929 Have we met before?

1097967 1101636 If we did...
I hope you're still breathing.
1101637 1104097 What's your name, honey?
1107043 1109712 Well, that's an appropriate name.
1116854 1118904 I was just thinking.
1125062 1128361 seems kind of dangerous...

1130434 1132201 I mean, how do you know
I'm not the killer?

1132202 1136482 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

1136607 1140927 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1220924 1226284 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1228899 1232602 We might ask
the same question, yes?

1315987 1319323 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.
1319324 1321291 It is said he is able to tune.
1321292 1322657 Impossible.

1322694 1325529 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1325530 1327998 On occasion the imprinting
does not take.

1327999 1331001 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1331002 1334671 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1334672 1336873 But this one was different, yes?

1336874 1338608 What has the doctor
to say about this?
1338609 1340644 He has failed to report in.

1340645 1343814 - And Mr. Quick?
- No more Mr. Quick.
1343815 1346807 Mr. Quick, dead, yes.
1349854 1352448 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1352490 1355357 Mr. Book, does he know?
1356694 1359496 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1359497 1362399 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1362400 1366403 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1366404 1369005 Mr. Night, you will take the East.
1369006 1371804 Mr. Face, you the West.
1371843 1373977 Mr. Glove, the South.
1373978 1376208 Mr. Shade, the North.
1377749 1380718 We must have this man.

1394365 1399936 Do you really think my husband could be
capable of committing those murders?

1403040 1407960 Let's hope, for both our sakes,
that I'm wrong.
1450221 1453411 I've been so worried about you.
1455760 1457894 Are you punishing me?

1457895 1460530 You know, if disappearing
is your way of punishing me...
1460531 1461665 I don't appreciate it.

1461666 1465766 I don't know what
you're talking about.
1466571 1469105 I found these keys in my pocket...
1469106 1471802 so I assume I live here.
1471843 1473643 You supposed to be my wife?
1473644 1475669 Supposed to be?
1480051 1483282 don't know who I am, do you?
1483321 1484554 Your doctor called me.

1484555 1486089 He was worried
that this might happen.
1490195 1492263 he gave me his card.
1492264 1494832 He's desperate to find you.

1501673 1503808 I feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1503809 1507311 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1507312 1509439 I had an affair.
1510516 1512950 You were angry at me.
1515387 1517288 The police are looking for you.
1517289 1519624 I know. I saw the papers.
1519625 1523115 "Killer stalks city streetwalkers. "
1525697 1529292 I was with one of those women...
1529334 1531802 before I came here tonight.
1531803 1533504 I don't understand.
1533505 1536465 I met her outside an Automat.
1536475 1539076 I guess I wanted to test myself.

1539077 1543047 I wanted to know if I had it in me
to do those things.

1543048 1551298 Maybe I have lost my mind, but whoever
I am, I'm still me and I'm not a killer.
1553992 1555960 I believe you.

1563268 1566103 The car outside,
the one you arrived in.

1566104 1569844 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1570576 1573244 I didn't know he was still here.
1575581 1578401 Hold it right there, mister!
1579718 1581719 Wait. You have the wrong man.
1581720 1582887 Stand aside, will you, please?
1582888 1584522 I didn't kill anyone.

1584523 1588559 Right now what you are
is a suspect. Turn yourself in.

1588560 1590161 I'll listen to whatever
you have to say.

1590162 1593164 You're not gonna believe
what I have to say.
1594866 1596467 There's someone after me.

1596468 1599637 There's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1599638 1603040 And I don't even know if-
They're not even-

1603041 1605309 Yeah, who's gonna
listen to a madman?
1605310 1607144 Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
1612117 1614847 No one ever listens to me.
1620392 1621802 Murdoch, stop!
1664169 1665202 How much further?
1665203 1667843 We're almost there, buddy.

1669441 1672777 Hey, you happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1672778 1675714 You're kidding. Me and the missus
spent our honeymoon there.

1675715 1680405 All you gotta do is take
Main Street west to-
1681287 1683021 Or is it the cross-

1683022 1686692 You know, that's funny.
I can't seem to remember...

1686693 1691203 if it's Main Street west
or the cross-town.

1693666 1697235 I'm sorry, Inspector,
I cannot be of more assistance...

1697236 1699137 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1699138 1703228 Well, I appreciate
your taking the time.

1709649 1711983 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1711984 1716688 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.
1716689 1719391 Murdoch doesn't strike me as one.

1719392 1723095 Perhaps you are not
accustomed to digging deep enough.

1723096 1725664 Well, I do know when someone
is lying to me, Doctor.

1725665 1728333 Forgive me, Inspector,
but you are not a clinician.

1728334 1732104 Judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1732105 1734172 Well, maybe you could
give me a few pointers.
1736042 1738110 Let's take you, for instance.
1738111 1741478 You are a fastidious man, driven.
1741514 1743573 Consumed by details.
1744350 1747130 I would say your life is...
1747553 1748963 rather lonely.

1749355 1754215 Good evening, Inspector.
I really must be going.

1793299 1797633 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.

1807180 1812751 Most unfortunate it is that we were
forced to seek you out here.

1812752 1816121 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this...

1817824 1821026 - I'm sorry. I-
- Failed to report in, yes.

1821027 1823695 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1823696 1827599 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.

1827600 1830302 We found this
in his hotel room.

1830303 1834272 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?
1834273 1835373 I tried to imprint him...

1835374 1837542 but he woke up, he knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.
1837543 1839678 I tried to stop him but he was too fast.
1839679 1840879 He has no memories, then?

1840880 1844282 Only fragments.
The procedure, it was interrupted.

1844283 1848119 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1848120 1849721 You have had strays
before, right?

1849722 1853792 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can tune.

1853793 1856628 But that's impossible.
I thought only you had that ability.

1856629 1860966 You will process another template
of the subject's memories, yes?
1860967 1862734 Of course. I'll imprint him again.

1862735 1867826 No. We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1868075 1870576 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1870577 1873579 We'll talk again
after tonight's tuning, but...
1873580 1875414 no more delays, yes?

1875415 1880216 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1887728 1890818 You appear quite frail, Doctor.

1891365 1895455 Perhaps some exercise
would do you good.

1914755 1917305 - How is he?
- The same.
1917791 1920385 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1926733 1928283 Come in, Frank.
1931104 1933004 Close the door.

1940447 1943849 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1943850 1946400 It's an interesting case.

1947054 1951889 The kind that can make
a man's career...
1953160 1955528 Yeah, I was on that case.

1955529 1959795 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1959833 1961701 Nothing happened, Frank.

1961702 1965871 I've just been spending time
on the subway, riding in circles.
1965872 1967872 Thinking in circles.
1968675 1970685 There's no way out.

1971578 1975678 I've been over every inch
of this city.

1978185 1980586 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1980587 1982507 She's not my wife.

1983790 1986792 I don't know who she is.
I don't know who any of us are.
1986793 1988761 What makes you say that?

1988762 1992298 Do you think about
the past much, Frank?
1992299 1994367 As much as the next guy.

1994368 1997536 See, I've been trying
to remember things-

1997537 2000272 clearly remember things
from my past.

2000273 2005745 But the more I try to think back,
the more it all starts to unravel.
2005746 2007113 None of it seems real.

2007114 2010516 It's like I've just been
dreaming this life...

2010517 2014120 and when I finally wake up
I'll be somebody else.
2014121 2016751 Somebody totally different.

2020694 2023429 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie?
2023430 2026480 Something to do with the case.

2027034 2030536 There is no case.
There never was!

2030537 2034974 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
2075450 2078251 Tonight's requirements are...

2078252 2083019 12 family photo albums,
9 personal diaries...

2083057 2087997 17 love letters,
assorted childhood photographs...

2088029 2092165 26 wallets,
ID's and social security cards.
2092166 2095076 These do bring back memories.
2096637 2098905 This one is still warm.
2100741 2103977 The recollections of a great lover?
2103978 2107004 A catalog of conquests?
2107048 2109328 We will soon find out.

2109917 2114588 You wouldn't appreciate that,
would you, Mr. Whatever your name is?

2114589 2119859 Not the sort of conquests
you would ever understand.
2122263 2125173 A touch of unhappy childhood.
2130805 2133625 A dash of teenage rebellion.
2135276 2138074 And last, but not least...
2138112 2140413 a tragic death in the family.
2152126 2153894 Why does Murdoch not sleep...
2153895 2155829 during the tuning as the others do?

2155830 2160000 I don't know. Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.

2160001 2162903 A freak of nature.
He's adapting to survive.

2162904 2166339 What do you expect?
Weren't you looking for the human soul?

2166340 2168942 That's the purpose
of your little zoo, isn't it?

2168943 2172312 That's why you keep changing people
and things around every night.

2172313 2175448 Maybe you have finally found
what you are looking for...

2175449 2179189 and it's going
to bite you on your-

2180621 2184291 It requires several of your lifetimes
to master our gifts.

2184292 2188195 The idea that a simple man
could develop the ability to tune-
2188196 2189763 Is absurd, I know...

2189764 2193444 but what other
explanation is there?
2243785 2245155 Shut it down.
2260802 2263442 Get your paper right here!
2273682 2275449 It's driving me crazy.
2276918 2278753 And they call my job "unskilled".
2278754 2280087 You think you've got it tough?

2280088 2282857 You try looking after these kids,
for a change.

2282858 2287528 Anyways, Frederickson says he'll
take me off the damn night shift soon.
2287529 2290399 Well, it's about time, dear.
2390632 2392772 Can anybody hear me?!
2395771 2399229 Let the tuning commence.

2558834 2561903 The Goodwins.
Jeremy, Sylvia...
2561904 2564314 Jane and little Matthew.
2568010 2570420 Jane and little Matthew.
2600209 2602871 The rich get richer.

2602912 2608772 Probably have maid's quarters
before the night is through.
2659770 2662104 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2664574 2666809 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor.

2666810 2668611 If that's what you are,
huh, Doctor?
2668612 2670046 Mr. Murdoch, please, I-

2670047 2671947 What is happening here?
Why is everyone asleep?
2671948 2674350 Shh. Please keep your voice down.

2674351 2676318 Why can't I remember anything?
What have you done to me?

2676319 2679121 Nothing, nothing.
Please, I want to help you.
2679122 2680456 We can't talk here.

2680457 2682692 It is not safe.
If they see us together, they'll-

2682693 2684160 I don't care.
I want some answers.
2684161 2685528 I want some answers now!
2685529 2686729 Who are they?
2686730 2688698 Why are they trying to kill me?
2695105 2698268 My God. You really can do it.

2699643 2701911 Listen to me, John.
You have their power.

2701912 2704046 You can make things happen
by will alone.

2704047 2707383 They call it tuning. That is how
they make the buildings change.

2707384 2709985 Just now you acted out
of self-defense. A reflex.

2709986 2712855 But I can teach you to control
your power consciously.

2712856 2715224 Let me help you, John.
Together we can stop them.
2715225 2717915 We can take the city back.
2723333 2725267 My glasses, please.

2772382 2775084 He made a terrible
impression for the firm...
2775085 2777453 lollygagging around as he did.

2777454 2780389 So I simply told Frederickson
I was going to have to let him go.
2780390 2783425 And well you should have, darling.
2783426 2784976 He attacked me.
2785762 2788097 I don't know where he has gone.
2788098 2790008 Come, Dr. Schreber.
2791001 2792635 We have much to do.

2811122 2818722 They say that you're
a run-around lover
2818763 2822665 Though you say

2829774 2835542 But if you put me down
for another
2840151 2844588 Believe me, I'll know
2846290 2850158 'Cause the night
2850194 2854130 Has a thousand eyes
2855032 2858968 And a thousand eyes
2859003 2862268 Can't tell, but see
2864642 2871206 If you are true to me
2872917 2876978 So remember
2877021 2882721 When you tell those little white lies

2882760 2893193 That the night
has a thousand eyes
2896307 2900641 A thousand eyes

2907318 2910887 Tonight's experiment shall be conducted
in the following locations.

2910888 2915325 The first subject
shall be imprinted here on Avenue M.
2915326 2917894 Mr. Book. There is a problem.

2917895 2921264 There is no Avenue M.
We were unable to complete it.

2921265 2925035 During the last tuning
we detected a lack of control.

2925036 2927737 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2927738 2932509 Then this man Murdoch
is more powerful than we thought.
2932510 2934311 He's becoming like us.
2934312 2938874 So we must become like him.

2938916 2941384 The good doctor
has done as we asked?

2941385 2946025 The life and times
of John Murdoch, Volume 2.
2947024 2949356 We must not do this.

2949393 2952963 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2952964 2955665 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?
2955666 2957998 Everywhere he goes...

2958035 2960704 everyone he seeks out
will be known to us.

2960705 2965742 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.

2965743 2968445 Perhaps we have forgotten
what happened last time, when we t-
2968446 2971574 Yes. Poor, poor Mr. -
2971615 2973516 We have not forgotten.

2973517 2980787 If Mr. Hand wishes to make this
sacrifice for the greater good...

2982893 2988131 But to imprint one of us.
Failure has always resulted.

2988132 2991701 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2998810 3001000 This may sting a bit.
3043522 3047049 I have John Murdoch... in mind.

3053765 3057268 "I found this postcard
among your mother's things.

3057269 3059437 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
3059438 3061303 "Stop by sometime.

3061339 3063174 "We'll see if we
can't hook ourselves...
3063175 3064542 "another mermaid.
3064543 3066773 "Love to Emma. Karl. "
3075220 3076949 Karl Harris.

3094639 3097541 Excuse me. Can you tell
me the way to Avenue C?
3097542 3099092 Try the subway.
3102747 3104348 You got a problem, pal?
3104349 3107284 You been working here long?

3108353 3112493 25 years. No days off
for good behavior.
3136781 3139944 We're looking for John Murdoch.
3173919 3176053 She knows nothing, Mr. Hand.
3176054 3178222 A dead end, yes, Mr. Wall.

3178223 3180858 We thought his imprint would
allow us to track him, yes...

3180859 3183327 but instead we have
been brought here.
3183328 3184996 This is irrational.
3184997 3187365 Instincts are irrational, Mr. Wall...

3187366 3190835 and we must follow
where they lead, yes.

3190836 3195373 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar... his job.

3338517 3341527 And I know where to find her.

3392439 3394805 Something... better.

3410056 3411926 on this very spot.

3700181 3704141 Stay here.

3787969 3791879 The inspector is gonna take me. Thanks.

4666951 4669146 Yes. Yes, of course.

4699051 4701421 You're not crazy, John.

4711464 4713031 Everything you need to know...

4752905 4754139 If you don't mind.

4892379 4895948 They abducted us

4895949 4898751 This city, everyone in it...
4898752 4900152 is their experiment.

4900153 4903088 They mix and match

4903089 4906558 trying to divine

4906559 4909361 One day, a man

4909362 4912298 The next, someone entirely different.

4912299 4915634 When they want to

4915635 4920572 they simply imprint one of their

4920573 4925411 arrange a family for him,

4925412 4927046 even a lost wallet.
4927047 4930047 Then they observe the results.

4938325 4943362 This business of you being a killer

4943363 4946265 You have had dozens

4946266 4950369 You just happened to wake up while

4950370 4952538 Why are they doing all of this?
4952539 4955975 It is our capacity for individuality...

4955976 4958577 our souls that makes

4958578 4960980 They think they

4960981 4964149 if they understand

4964150 4965451 All they have

4965452 4968285 They share one group mind.
4968321 4969822 They're dying, you see?

4969823 4973292 Their entire race

4973293 4975194 They think we can save them.

4975195 4978263 - Where do I fit in?

4978264 4982264 You resisted my attempt

4985739 4989174 Somehow you have developed

4989175 4990509 That is how they change things.
4990510 4992077 That is how they built this city.

4995015 4999818 that allow them

4999819 5002354 They control everything here,

5002355 5005724 That's why it's always dark.

5007027 5011463 When they first brought us here,

5011464 5015334 So they could store the information,

5015335 5017903 and give us back new memories

5017904 5022544 But they still needed an artist

5023376 5026578 I understood the intricacies

5026579 5029148 better than they ever could...

5029149 5031917 so they allowed me

5031918 5033385 because they needed them.

5033386 5037476 But they made me

5044230 5047099 Can you imagine what

5053106 5055802 Shell Beach, Uncle Karl.

5058778 5060712 This was blank when I found it!

5066019 5068854 Your entire history is an illusion,

5068855 5070757 as it is with all of us.

5073294 5076254 You say they brought us here.
5084105 5085885 I don't remember.
5085906 5088341 None of us remember that...
5088342 5089976 what we once were...
5089977 5092445 what we might have been...
5092446 5093946 somewhere else.

5113300 5115468 You don't need me anymore.
5161382 5164180 There is no ocean, John.
5164218 5168348 There is nothing beyond the city.
5168389 5171722 The only place home exists...
5173561 5175552 is in your head.
5222610 5225390 And now you know the truth.

5293415 5296350 You'll allow yourself

5296351 5298619 or it will result in

5298620 5301188 What do I care?

5301189 5302356 She's nothing to me!

5320075 5322343 Don't hurt her, please!

5410899 5415097 It is time to be one

5421776 5423644 It is time, Doctor.

5466288 5468656 Imprint, Doctor.

5470526 5473896 The pain will only last a moment.
5485040 5486540 Remember, John.

5487610 5489611 You'll rise to greater

5489612 5493147 One day when you're older,

5495584 5498486 That's it, John.

5498487 5501723 Now remember what I told you.

5501724 5503521 John, remember.

5511166 5512901 to teach you about the strangers.

5541063 5542964 The machine

5542965 5544566 You must take control of it.

5859016 5860516 I knew you could do it, John.
